meta.hint: Antonyms are words with opposite meanings. Example - big, little
meta.question: Identify the antonym of the word in the context.

content.description:
Select the Antonym of dark.
The sky was dark.

Select the Antonym of goodbye.
Did George say goodbye to you?

Select the Antonym of different.
He was wearing two different color socks.

Select the Antonym of friends.
You should try to make friends

Select the Antonym of late.
I thought we would be late.
